side of the

herr Doktor,
Can you elaborte on that ? Do you mean all Goto pieces have origami
originally ?
Can you kindly point out any literatures that have pics of this "
traiangular punch marks " ? ( so i can get my miniature punch and add
some......... =) )
I looked at the 17 Goto masters book, none of the enlarged pics show
any triangular punch marks, so those pieces have no origami ?

-M

messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] secret marks of the Goto
messages.msgSnippet: A very small, triangular shaped punch typically somewhere on the side of the piece. You will need a loop to see them and they are only there if the pieces have
messages.messageBody:
A very small, triangular shaped punch typically somewhere on the side of the
piece. You will need a loop to see them and they are only there if the
pieces have an origami. I wouldn’t spend too much time trying to find it on
those rats, though.



Gordon
